creator: f_leveque@yahoo.com
text:
I tried a telnet task with ANT 1.6.2:
- AIX 5.1 it's OK 
- AIX 5.2 it's not OK the task freeze. I must make a CTRL-C to stop it

Does it hang during login or at any other point in time?

The task waits for "ogin:" and "assword:" respectively if you have specified
username and password.  What does the login prompt look like when you telnet
to your machine manually?
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
You may want to try adding -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true to the Ant command 
line to see if that helps. I have seen some very long delays on AIX 5.2 with the 
IBM 1.4 VM when it needs to resolve remote addresses.
creator: robert.clark@quest.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: I'll simply assumes this has been fixed by upgrading Ant and commons-net.  Please re-open if I'm wrong.
